original_text: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses, inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house.
korean_text: 그는 모세보다 더욱 영광을 받을 만한 것이 마치 집 지은 자가 그 집보다 더욱 존귀함 같으니라

sentences.original_text: For this man was counted worthy
inasmuch as he who hath builded the house
hath more honour than the house
sentences.korean_translation: 집 자체보다 더 큰 영예를 가지는 것처럼
